title: EA wants to expand into the "gigantic action" sandbox genre
text:
EA wants to expand into the "gigantic action" sandbox genre 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Like sands through the hourglass, so are the games of our lives. Just about every studio out there has a sandbox game these days, except EA....
